name: Travelodge Inn & Suites Albany

reviews.text: This is a basic roadside hotel with clean and comfortable rooms .We arrived late after driving up from Newark airport on the way to Montreal. We were greeted pleasantly by the front desk staff (owners?) who checked us in to a ground floor room after seeing the amount of luggage we had - a nice touch - and gave us info about restaurants still open within walking distance at that time of night ( 10:30 p.m).
reviews.title: Decent for a Stopover

reviews.text: As one reviewer has already pointed out, there was a floral disinfectant smell when we got to the room, but nothing unbearable. The room was sufficiently clean, a decent size and had comfortable beds and a reasonable bathroom. We had a good night's sleep despite looking directly onto the carpark. It must be mentioned that the hotel is set quite far back from the main road, and is sheltered from the interstate be trees, so we were not disturbed by traffic noise at all.
reviews.title: Good Location and Friendly Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The included breakfast was very basic ( the coffee was like sock juice) , and served in polystyrene. What's the point of doing the 'save water and soap - and hotel running costs !?- by not changing your towels every day' thing in the rooms if you're as uncommitted to environmental issues as to chuck out hundreds of plastic cups and plates every year ? However, it served our needs ( apart from a lack of a caffeine kick start) and let us get on the road again quicker.
reviews.title: Newly renovated!!!

reviews.text: All in all, this is a decent place for a very decent price if all you're looking for is a place to stop overnight.
reviews.title: Very basic accomodations at a great price

reviews.text: The rooms are quiet and the beds are comfortable. Close to mall and restaurants. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The morning we were checking out our car would not start - the battery had died. The manager went out of his way to help us jump our car.
reviews.title: Nice Stay
Awesome Experience
reviews.text: Fantastic service, great newly remodelled rooms. Felt as though I was staying at a 5 star hotel. Definetely recommend!!!
I was in town for training at the local DOT offices which happen to share the same parking lot so the convenience was wonderful.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, conveniently located

description: Great Location, AAA Approved, Friendly Staff, Albany Airport, State Capital, SUNY, RPI, Siena College, Saratoga Race Track, Cooperstown & many Hospitals are only minutes away. Colonie Center Mall accross the street...Regal Theaters, Barnes & Noble, Macy's, Sears, Christmas Tree Shop, LL Bean, Cheesecake Factory, PF Chang's, Buca diBeppo, Chile's, Hooter's, IHop and Dunkin Donuts are all with walking distance.
